<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
<!-------------------- THIS MARKDOWN FILE IS AUTOGENERATED -------------------->
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->

A request for blocks with the specified hashes.

### Message Name

`getblocks`

### Payload

|    Parameter   | Type  |              Description              |
|:--------------:|-------|:-------------------------------------:|
| `block_hashes` | array | A list of hashes of blocks to request |
